data.message: Kindly please remove me from being blocked

replies.message: Hi Joy. Your account may have been blocked due to member feedback received by our team. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2e4Uihs. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, you can also submit an appeal. -Nick
I already submit an appeal many times

Please kindly remove me from being blocked.. This is so unfair.. I am working here in facebook.. Kindly review all my post. I am just marketing my products in group so I can sell and I have income.. I work here in Facebook.. Thank you.. :)

Please kindly remove me from being blocked.. This is so unfair.. I am working here in facebook.. Kindly review all my post. I am just marketing my products in group so I can sell and I have income.. I work here in Facebook.. Thank you.. :)
